title: Ticket #2732: Create a new condor_reset_stats tool
description:
For testing, it would be convenient to have a tool that clears out "Recent" windowed statistics. This enables tests to have a common state to test against.

This tool will be built as part of condor_reconfig, and ln 'ed to condor_reset_stats. The scope of this is for testing.

Looking forward, the tool will need to know (machine,port,pool name) triple.

Statistics already have Tick, Publish, and Reset methods. Need to learn how to use these correctly.

There is a question about what to do to statistics that are not part of pools. By definition, a statistics pool is a set of statistics that share ticks and window size.

Also, should there be an option to specify lifetime statistics or windowed statistics?
